Name: Mulled Apple Black
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: HEAT all ingredients and pour into warmed glass.
Review: Fruity rich and warming with apple (calvados) and blackberry.
History: Created in February 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Mulled Apple Black contains 190 calories
